unnormalised: The residents of Green Valley society celebrated the farewell of Mr. Sharma yesterday. Mr. Sharma, fondly known as "Sharma Ji" by everyone, is moving back to his hometown after 30 yrs in Mumbai.
normalised: The residents of Green Valley society celebrated the farewell of Mister Sharma yesterday. Mister Sharma, fondly known as "Sharma Ji" by everyone, is moving back to his hometown after thirty years in Mumbai.

unnormalised: "He was like a father figure to all of us," said Mrs. Verma, a long-time resident. Even the building's watchman, known as Bhaiyya Ramu, got emotional while speaking about Sharma Ji. The farewell party started at 7:30 PM and went on till late with singing and dancing.
normalised: "He was like a father figure to all of us," said Missus Verma, a long-time resident. Even the building's watchman, known as Bhaiyya Ramu, got emotional while speaking about Sharma Ji. The farewell party started at seven thirty P-M and went on till late with singing and dancing.

unnormalised: Many youngsters fondly remembered him as "Uncle Sharma" who always had words of wisdom and chocolates to share. Several residents made speeches praising Mr. Sharmaâ€™s helpful nature and community spirit. The consensus was that Green Valley society would not be the same without him.
